summary: "Detective K" tells about the adventures of Joseon's top detective (Kim Myeong-min) as he investigates, as ordered by the King, a series of mysterious murders plaguing the country. During ... See full summary Â»

title: Joseon myungtamjung: Gakshituku ggotui biil
